rationale.complexity: Specs are modular and well-structured, but lack explicit test case examples and automation details, increasing cognitive load.
rationale.coverage: Coverage goals are ambitious and broad, but lack specifics on measurement and handling of hard-to-cover code. Most critical paths are addressed.
rationale.performance: Performance is considered (e.g., large transcripts, CI parallelization), but test automation and optimization strategies are only partially specified.
rationale.clarity: Specs are logically organized, but ambiguity remains due to missing concrete examples, traceability, and documentation format.
rationale.security: Security is prioritized with input validation, secret handling, and attack simulation, but lacks detailed negative test scenarios and regular update processes.
